Articles.Content:
My orbiters on the exact opposite side of the planet can still be controlled, and no, I do not have any satellites other than the one in question

KSP version 1.1.0, remotetech from github, for 1.1.0

It's the only mod on the save

Edited May 23, 2016 by The Optimist
If i remember correctly, remotetech has a config option for probes to be controllable without contact, but no science transmission.
Depending on your config, there might broadcasting antennas scattered around the planet. Your probe might be getting a signal through one of those.
